original_text: “The eye is the lamp of the body. If your eyes are healthy, your whole body will be full of light.
korean_text: 눈은 몸의 등불이니 그러므로 네 눈이 성하면 온 몸이 밝을 것이요

sentences.original_text: The eye is the lamp of the body
your whole body will be full of light
sentences.korean_translation: 네 온 몸이 빛으로 가득할 것이요
